mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_TBL SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle} , BOARD_CONTENTS=#{boardContents} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE BOARD_TBL SET BOARD_STATUS='N' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENTS, B.MEMBER_ID, WRITE_DATE, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_STATUS, BOARD_TYPE_NAME,NVL(CNT,0) AS BOARD_FILE_COUNT,M.MEMBER_NAME FROM BOARD_TBL B JOIN BOARD_TYPE_TBL ON(BOARD_TYPE = BOARD_TYPE_NO) JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON(B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT F.BOARD_NO, COUNT(BOARD_FILE_NO) AS CNT FROM BOARD_FILE_TBL F GROUP BY F.BOARD_NO) C ON(B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
